properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ADDR, ENROLL_DT, STATUS_CD, GRADE_CD FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND STATUS_CD != 101
INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS_CD != 101 AND MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS_CD != 101 AND MEMBER_EMAIL = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ADDR FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND STATUS_CD != 101 AND GRADE_CD = 200
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_EMAIL= ? , MEMBER_PHONE= ? , MEMBER_ADDR= ? WHERE MEMBER_NO=?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_PW = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS_CD = (SELECT STATUS_CD FROM MEMBER_STATUS WHERE STATUS_NM = '탈퇴') WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
